Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package nmi for versions less than 1.8.7-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package nmi for versions less than 1.8.7-14. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package nmi is earlier than 1.8.7-14, affected by CVE-2023-44487
